name: An Introduction to MQTT: Why HTTP isn't the King of the Internet of Things
description: Shinji Kim, Robert Bird - Akamai, Samsung Developer Conference 2017.

name: Einführung in MQTT
description: Dominik Obermaier & Jens Deters, Building IoT conference 2016 (German).

description: MQTT broker service and protocol adapter

name: Aedes
description: Barebone MQTT broker that can run on any stream server, the node way.

name: Emitter

description: Scalable and Reliable Real-time MQTT Messaging Engine for IoT in 5G Era.

name: esp_uMQTT_broker
description: A basic MQTT Broker on the ESP8266.

name: hbmqtt
description: Python MQTT broker using asyncio.

name: HiveMQ
description: Java MQTT Broker that supports MQTT 3.1, 3.1.1 and 5.0. Commercial and open source editions available.

name: hrotti
description: A MQTT broker written in Go.

name: KMQTT
description: Kotlin Multiplatform MQTT broker, both embeddable and standalone.

name: Moquette
description: Java MQTT lightweight broker.

name: Mosca

name: Mosquitto
description: "The" Open Source MQTT Broker.

name: Free test server hosted by the Eclipse Foundation.
Authorization Plugin in Go supports many types of logins.
Let's Encrypt Mosquitto Docker Container makes it easy to encrypt.
MyQttHub
description: Cloud MQTT broker.

name: Mystique
description: An extendable MQTT broker written in Go, with HTTP capabilities for observability. Implements MQTT v3.1.1.

name: RabbitMQ
description: RabbitMQ offers a MQTT Adapter.

name: SurgeMQ
description: High Performance MQTT Server and Client Libraries in Go.

name: VerneMQ
description: an Apache2 licensed distributed MQTT broker, developed in Erlang.

name: Vert.x MQTT
description: Vert.x component to handle connections, communication and messages exchange with remote MQTT clients.

name: Waterstream
description: MQTT broker leveraging Apache Kafka as its own storage and distribution engine.

name: Adafruit IO
description: Adafruit IO is the easiest way to connect your project to the internet. You can easily connect your project to Adafruit IO with your device-of-choice by using your programming language of choice (we have lots of libraries) and control or monitor over the internet. Data stored with Adafruit IO is yours to manage and control.

name: Alibaba Cloud IoT Platform
description: Provides secure and reliable communication between devices and the IoT Platform which allows you to manage a large number of devices on a single IoT Platform.

name: AWS IoT Core
description: AWS IoT Core is a managed cloud service that lets connected devices easily and securely interact with cloud applications and other devices. AWS IoT Core can support billions of devices and trillions of messages, and can process and route those messages to AWS endpoints and to other devices reliably and securely. With AWS IoT Core, your applications can keep track of and communicate with all your devices, all the time, even when they aren’t connected.

name: Azure IoT Hub
description: Enable highly secure and reliable communication between your IoT application and the devices it manages. Azure IoT Hub provides a cloud-hosted solution backend to connect virtually any device. Extend your solution from the cloud to the edge with per-device authentication, built-in device management, and scaled provisioning.

name: CloudMQTT
description: Hosted message broker for the Internet of Things. Perfectly configured and optimized message queues for IoT, ready in seconds.

name: EMQ X MQTT Cloud
description: A secure, reliable MQTT cloud service with best pratices from EMQ team.

name: flespi
description: Free and secure cloud MQTT broker with private namespaces, MQTT 3.1.1 and MQTT 5.0 support and gorgeous limits.

name: Google Cloud IoT
description: Google Cloud IoT is a complete set of tools to connect, process, store, and analyze data both at the edge and in the cloud. The platform consists of scalable, fully-managed cloud services; an integrated software stack for edge/on-premises computing with machine learning capabilities for all your IoT needs.

name: HiveMQ Cloud
description: HiveMQ Cloud is a fully managed MQTT platform that connects IoT devices to any IoT cloud platform. A cloud native IoT messaging platform that simplifies reliable and scalable IoT device connectivity.

name: IBM WATSON
description: With Watson, you can bring AI tools and apps to your data wherever it resides – whether it's on IBM Cloud, AWS, Azure, Google, or your own private cloud platform.

name: mainflux
description: device management, data aggregation, data management, data analytics,connectivity and message routing and event management. Supported by Linux Software Foundation.

name: thingsboard
description: Device management, data collection, processing, event management, and visualization for your IoT projects.
